name: HARRIS COUNTY FLOOD CONTROL DISTRICT ON BEHALF OF STUART CONSULTING
description: Partners with Army Corps of Engineers regarding reducing flood risks in Harrison County.
sampleDescriptions: Waiver on NRCS regulations for Harris County Flood Control hurricane repair projects.
Lobbied House and Senate for a waiver on NRCS regulations for Harris County Flood Control hurricane repair projects.
